emailPage.whatIsEmail: What is the registered email address for the partnership?
emailPage.emailHint: Partners must be able to access emails that are sent to this address.

emailUsedFor.title: What is the registered email address used for?
emailUsedFor.sendInformation: In future we'll use this to send important information that relates to the limited partnership. For example, new legislative requirements or warnings about missed deadlines.
emailUsedFor.publicRegister: It will not be shown on the public register.

namePage.title: Limited partnership name
namePage.whatIsName: What is the limited partnership name?
namePage.whatIsNameHint: Do not enter a name ending like Limited Partnership or LP. We will add this for you.
namePage.existingPartnershipHint: You must check the name is not the same as an existing partnership or company on the Companies House register (opens in a new tab). If it is, weâ€™ll reject your application.
namePage.sensitiveWordHint: If the name includes sensitive words or expressions that require approval (opens in a new tab), you must get permission before you register.
namePage.existingTrademarkHint: You should also use the trade mark search (opens in a new tab) to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.
namePage.nameEnding: Which limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?
namePage.nameEndingHint: There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P., except for how they look.

privateFund.title: Private fund limited partnership name
privateFund.whatIsName: What's the name of the private fund limited partnership?
privateFund.nameEnding: Which private fund limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?

scottish.title: Scottish private fund limited partnership name
scottish.whatIsName: What's the name of the private fund limited partnership?

scottish.title: Scottish limited partnership name
scottish.whatIsName: What's the name of the Scottish limited partnership?
scottish.nameEnding: Which name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?

whichTypePage.title: Which type of partnership do you want to register?

options.LP: Limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland
options.PFLP: Private fund limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland
options.SPFLP: Private fund limited partnership in Scotland

generalPartnersPage.title: You now need to tell us about the general partners
generalPartnersPage.pageInformation: If the partnership has more than one general partner, you'll add them one at a time.

generalPartnerChoicePage.title: Is the general partner a person or a legal entity?

limitedPartnersPage.title: You now need to tell us about the limited partners
limitedPartnersPage.pageInformation: If the partnership has more than one limited partner, you'll add them one at a time.

limitedPartnerChoicePage.isPersonOrLegalEntity: Is the limited partner a person or a legal entity?

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.spelling: If you typed the web address, check it is spelled correctly.
pageNotFound.copiedAddress: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pageNotFound.movedPage: If the web address is correct or you selected a link, the page may have moved.
pageNotFound.goToStartPage: To register a limited partnership, go to the Register a limited partnership start page.

errorPage.title: Sorry, the service is unavailable
errorPage.tryLater: You will be able to use the service at a later date.
errorPage.moreInfo: Email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk, if you need more information.
